articles.title: AirAsia renamed Capital A to show it's more than an airline - CNA
articles.description:
KUALA LUMPUR: Malaysia's AirAsia Group said on Friday (Jan 28) it has changed the name of its listed holding company to Capital A to reflect the diversity of its business portfolio as it seeks to grow its non-airline revenue.
